AGENT_BOTS.DESCRIPTION: Agent Bots are like the most fabulous members of your team. They can handle the small stuff, so you can focus on the stuff that matters. Give them a try. You can manage your bots from this page or create new ones using the 'Add Bot' button.

AVATAR.ERROR_DELETE: Error deleting bot avatar, please try again

BOT_CONFIGURATION.TITLE: 选择一个客服机器人
BOT_CONFIGURATION.DESC: 将代理机器人分配到您的收件箱。他们可以处理初始对话，并在必要时将其转移给真人客服。
BOT_CONFIGURATION.ERROR_MESSAGE: 无法更新代理机器人。请再试一次。
BOT_CONFIGURATION.DISCONNECTED_ERROR_MESSAGE: 无法断开客服机器人。请再试一次。

API.ERROR_MESSAGE: 无法添加机器人。请稍后再试。

LIST.404: No bots found. You can create a bot by clicking the 'Add Bot' button.

CONFIRM.TITLE: 确认删除
CONFIRM.MESSAGE: Are you sure you want to delete {name}?

API.ERROR_MESSAGE: 无法删除机器人。请再试一次。
无法更新机器人。请再试一次。

ERRORS.NAME: Bot name is required
ERRORS.VALID_URL: Please enter a valid URL starting with http:// or https://

WEBHOOK.DESCRIPTION: Configure a webhook bot to integrate with your custom services. The bot will receive and process events from conversations and can respond to them.
